subject: Re: [PATCHv6 08/17] mm: Make page_zonenum() use head page

reviews.author: Kiryl Shutsemau (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Kiryl Shutsemau raised concerns about the patch [PATCHv6 08/17] mm: Make page_zonenum() use head page, suggesting it would be overkill and likely unused for most nodes, but agreed to move the functionality to per-zone.

reviews.author: Muchun Song
reviews.summary: Muchun Song reviewed patch 08/17 and approved it, giving an Acked-by tag.

reviews.author: David (arm)
reviews.summary: Reviewer David raised concerns about the patch making page_zonenum() use head page, questioning whether a folio can cross zones and suggesting that it should be disallowed if possible.

reviews.author: Usama Arif
reviews.summary: Usama Arif raised concerns about the patch [PATCHv6 08/17] mm: Make page_zonenum() use head page, specifically pointing out that it doesn't work for ARM due to undefined behavior in ilog2 calculation.

reviews.author: Vlastimil Babka
reviews.summary: Vlastimil Babka expressed concerns about the patch to make page_zonenum() use head page, specifically questioning whether shared tail pages should be per node+zone instead of just per node.

reviews.author: Matthew Wilcox
reviews.summary: Matthew Wilcox questioned the correctness of returning the zone number of the head page, suggesting that the caller might be interested in the zone number of the current page.
